content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="fgdc_classic.xsl"?> <!DOCTYPE metadata SYSTEM "http://www.fgdc.gov/metadata/fgdc-std-001-1998.dtd"> <metadata>  <idinfo>   <citation>    <citeinfo>     <origin>NOAA National Marine Fisheries Service</origin>     <pubdate>Unpublished Material</pubdate>     <title>Leatherback Sea Turtle Critical Habitat</title>     <geoform Sync="TRUE">vector digital data</geoform>     <onlink>\\\\SERO-NOVELL-4\\DATA1\\GIS\\ESRI CATALOG\\ARCDATA\\PRODUCTS\\Distribution\\leathback_turtle_CH_VI_po</onlink>     <ftname Sync="TRUE">leathback_turtle_CH_VI_po</ftname></citeinfo>   </citation>   <descript>    <abstract>These data represent the critical habitat for leatherback turtle as designated by Federal Register Vol. 44, No. 17711, March 23, 1979, Rules and Regulations. Redesignated and amended at 64 FR 14067, March 23, 1999.</abstract>    <purpose>The purpose of these data is to visually represent the critical habitat areas for GIS analysis and display.</purpose>    <langdata Sync="TRUE">en</langdata></descript>   <timeperd>    <timeinfo>     <sngdate>      <caldate>19790323</caldate>      <time>0900</time>     </sngdate>    </timeinfo>    <current>ground condition</current>   </timeperd>   <status>    <progress>Complete</progress>    <update>As needed</update>   </status>   <spdom>    <bounding>     <westbc Sync="TRUE">-64.933180</westbc>     <eastbc Sync="TRUE">-64.833000</eastbc>     <northbc Sync="TRUE">17.703000</northbc>     <southbc Sync="TRUE">17.630262</southbc>    </bounding>    <lboundng><leftbc Sync="TRUE">-64.933180</leftbc><rightbc Sync="TRUE">-64.833000</rightbc><bottombc Sync="TRUE">17.630262</bottombc><topbc Sync="TRUE">17.703000</topbc></lboundng></spdom>   <keywords>    <theme>     <themekt>None</themekt>     <themekey>Leatherback Sea Turtle</themekey>     <themekey>Dermochelys coriacea</themekey>     <themekey>Critical Habitat</themekey>     <themekey>Endangered Species</themekey>     <themekey>GIS</themekey>    </theme>    <place>     <placekt>None</placekt>     <placekey>Caribbean</placekey>     <placekey>U.S. Virgin Islands</placekey>     <placekey>Sandy Point</placekey><placekey>St. Croix</placekey></place>    <stratum>     <stratkey>100 fathom curve</stratkey></stratum>   </keywords>   <accconst>None</accconst>   <useconst>Users be advised that the accuracy of this data set is completely dependent upon the accuracy of the shoreline data used in the creation process. For more details on this process, see the process description. The text description in 44 FR 17711 is always the one, true definition of leatherback turtle critical habitat. These or any other depictions are for information purposes only and shouldn't be relied on for regulatory purposes.</useconst>   <ptcontac>    <cntinfo>     <cntorgp>      <cntorg>NOAA-National Marine
